item.title: Runecrafting error
item.dc:creator: @ustalavista ustalavista
item.description:
@ustalavista wrote:

well of course … lol duh… [20] means skill # 20

your problem is, is for every rift except nature, it’s set up so if playerlevel[20] <= (LEVEL)

that means it will only work if your less then or equal to the level, change that to >= [br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 09:12:13 PM[/size][hr]for all of them[br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 09:12:43 PM[/size][hr]so are you going to be a nonpathetic leacher or thank me

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting error
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

The problem is that you can only craft nature runes. If someone can fix this could you please post and not just take this?
thanks

[code]if (objectID == 7133) // Nature rift
{
actionAmount++;

				if (actionTimer == 0)
				{
                      if(playerLevel[20] >= 59)
                      {
          if((playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1)==false))
          {
          sendMessage("You need essence!");
          }
          else if((playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1)==true))
          {
                           actionName = "nats";
                           actionTimer = 10;
                      }       
                      else if(actionTimer >= 1) 
                      {
                           sendMessage("You have to wait before you can make more runes.");
                      }                                          
			    }
		    }
	}
      if (actionName.equalsIgnoreCase("nats"))
	{
		sendMessage("You craft some runes.");
		addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[20]), 20);
		addItem(561, 1);
               		deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1);
		actionName = "";
	}

if (objectID == 7132) // Cosmic rift
